dcterms:creator: M. De Bois
dcterms:description: The IDIAB dataset has been collected by ourselves on 6 type-2 diabetic patients. The data collection has been approved by the French ethical committee. The patients had been monitored for 31.17 days in free-living conditions. While glucose values have been collected using FreeStyle Libre continuous glucose monitoring devices, CHO intakes and insulin infusion values have been obtained through the mySugr coaching application for diabetes.
dcterms:title: IDIAB Dataset

dcterms:creator: C. Marling
R. C. Bunescu
dcterms:description: The OhioT1DM dataset has been released for the Blood Glucose Level Prediction Challenge. It is made of data coming from 6 type-1 diabetic patients that had been monitored for 8 weeks in free living conditions. The study focuses on the most important signals which are the glucose values, the insulin infusions, and the CHO intakes.
dcterms:title: OhioT1DM Dataset
